00063                 public static function by_ip_addr($ip_addr, $params = NULL)
00064                 {
00065                         // Get GEOIP data from web service
00066                         $rough = file_get_contents(sprintf(GEOIP_LOOKUP, $ip_addr));
00067                         
00068                         // Split response in key-value lines
00069                         $pairs = explode("\n", $rough);
00070 
00071                         $geoip = parent::by_ip_addr($ip_addr, $params);
00072                         $geoip->ip_addr = $ip_addr;
00073                         $geoip->altitude = 0;
00074                         foreach ($pairs as $pair)
00075                         {
00076                                 // Create an element with given key-value association
00077                                 list($key, $value) = explode(":", $pair);
00078                                 $key = strtolower(str_replace(' ', '_', $key));
00079                                 $geoip->$key = trim($value);
00080                         }
00081 
00082                         return $geoip;
00083                 }
00084         }
